basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.name: Alexander Prokudin
basics.summary:
Current Software Engineer at BigData department of fintech company QIWI.
- 2+ years working closely with data at scale
- Motivated by enthusiastic team members
- Love to learn new tools & technologies and devise better problem-solving methods
- Nerd who embraces Vim philosophy tinkering with development environment

work.name: QIWI
highlights: Launched group of 2+ services for controlling the quality of a data
Tested durability and fault-tolerance of available service ecosystem, multiple suggestions were implemented
Participated in improving system SLA for upcoming business needs

work.name: QIWI
work.summary: Developing architecture of a data warehouse and a complex data pipelines; ML engineering
highlights: Having business concept, implemented MVP (Python) and then production solution (Scala) involving graph processing. That project has become the core of a new flagship product for BigData department
Developed complex data pipeline of collecting daily metrics of every user across the company group
Implemented solution for automated masking of sensitive data at data store for analytical usage

work.name: Freelance
work.summary: Freelance work on different Python projects, mainly bots and scrapers

education.institution: Institute of Economics, Mathematics and Information Technology (RANEPA)

skills.name: Interests
keywords: Developing database/data processing components at low-level

awards.title: 3rd place - Research and Development Hackathon
awards.summary:
Internal QIWI team hackathon of R&D thematics.
- Got 3rd prize place as a team of 2 engineers
- Designed and implemented MVP of BigData Dashboard interactive web app
- Rust backend & React frontend

awards.title: 2nd place - Russian National Team Competition of Applied Informatics
awards.summary: Designed and constructed MVP of car sharing application as a team of 3 people.
